mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS SEQ_NO , CTGR , TITLE , BODY , NOTI_TYPE , DEL_FLG , WORKER FROM TB_FAQ WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FAQ ( SEQ, CTGR, TITLE, BODY, DEL_FLG, NOTI_TYPE, REG_DT, WORKER, REG_DNT, UPD_DNT ) VALUES( 4, #{CTGR}, #{TITLE}, #{BODY}, '0', #{NOTI_TYPE}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d"), #{WORKER}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d%H%i%s"), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d%H%i%s"))
